text.title: 54 dead after bus crash in southern Brazil
text.head: 54 dead after bus crash in southern Brazil
Sources

list.item: "Brazil bus crash: At least 49 killed on way to religious event" — BBC News Online , March 15, 2015
"Death toll in Brazil bus crash rises to 54" — RTE News , March 15, 2015
"54 dead as tourist bus plunges into ravine in Brazil" — Russia Today , March 15, 2015
Brian Walker and Ben Brumfield. "50 die after bus plunges off road in southern Brazil" — CNN , March 15, 2015
